about_the_game:
The following track list is a total of 20 original songs collected in 《Last Devil》 game
Includes different styles of music from different parts of the ancient continent in the game
In addition, there are also songs that have been carefully composed for the needs of the battle and various plots
In addition to the original trilogy, the theme song has been added to the electric guitar version with 2 songs.

1 The Last Lord Chapter 1 Lost
2 The Last Lord Chapter 2 Struggle
3 The Last Fight(Chapter 2 Struggle).wav
4 The Last Lord Chapter 3 Glory
5 Dance with The Lord
6 Elf Magic Forest
7 Beast of the Grassland
8 Shaman's Cave
9 Never Defeated
10 Challenging Room
11 Mysterios Shop
12 Oh My Lord
13 Puzzle Room
14 Sacred Altar
15 The Box of Grace
16 Talking about the History
17 Chatting Time
18 Falling Death
